channel.title: Help fixing my enviroment variables please
channel.description: Before you tell me to justfuckinggoogleit.com, I already did, and I didn't find anything on it. I remember someone telling me how to do it on the IRC but I forgot how so can someone help? I screwed them up when I set the variables for Java and now I can't use certain DOS commands and stuff like that.

item.title: Help fixing my enviroment variables please
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

Start menu -> My computer -> Properties -> Advanced -> mov eax, [esp - 40] -> Set PATH to C:\WINDOWS;C:\WINDOWS\system32;C:\Program Files\Java<jreidentifier>\bin;

Thank you! I <3 you Javacisnotrecognized. lol (totaly non-sexual way)

Read full topic
item.source: Help fixing my enviroment variables please
